name: Advanced Hacker
description:
"Unfortunately we have to decline to publish your title. The team found that the gameplay was very difficult..."

- Desura

Advanced Hacker is a fast paced game of deduction and skill. You (The Hacker) must code-break into secret operation servers by figuring out their 4 digit password. Using your advanced hacking program, race the clock or play a quick game and hack all the servers!

This version was deemed to hard for the general public! You decide! The game was inspired by an old DOS game called "Sherlock". Advanced Hacker is just a cooler, single player, version of the numbers game, "Bulls & Cows".

The game features two(3) game modes;

- Quick Game
In Quick Game, there is no time limit. Use this mode to help hone your skills of deduction and perfect your hacking abilities.

- Play Game ( Normal Mode)
In Play Game mode, you race against the clock to hack as many servers as possible. Use your skills of deduction and quick thinking to figure out the 4 digit pin and move onto the next server. Your final score will be submitted to an online leader board!

Advanced Hacker also features an online leader board. Go up against your friends and become the ultimate hacker!
